00009 EVLOOP * EVLOOP_init(STACKS *stacks )
00010 {
00011   EVLOOP *loop;
00012 
00013   loop = (EVLOOP *)  malloc( sizeof( EVLOOP ) );
00014   if (!loop) {
00015     return 0;
00016   }
00017 
00018   if (!stacks) {
00019     return 0;
00020   }
00021   loop->stacks = stacks;
00022  
00023   disable_sigpipe();
00024 
00025   loop->ev_base = event_init();
00026   if (!loop->ev_base) {
00027     return 0;
00028   }
00029 
00030   return loop;
00031 }
00032 
00033 int EVLOOP_run( EVLOOP *loop )
00034 {
00035   return event_base_dispatch( loop->ev_base );
00036 }
00037 
00038 int EVLOOP_break( EVLOOP *loop )
00039 {
00040   return  event_base_loopbreak( loop->ev_base );

00043 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 int EVTHREAD_free( EVTHREAD *thread )
00045 {
00046    DLIST_entry *entry, *next;
00047    EVTHREAD_OBJECT *obj;
00048 
00049    DLIST_FOREACH_SAVE( entry, next,  &thread->object_list ) {
00050      obj = (EVTHREAD_OBJECT *) entry;
00051      switch( obj->object_type ) {
00052        case EVTHREAD_OBJECT_SOCKET:
00053          EVSOCKET_close( (EVSOCKET *) obj );    
00054          break;
00055        case EVTHREAD_OBJECT_TIMER:
00056          EVTIMER_free( (EVTIMER *) obj );    
00057          break;
00058      }
00059    }
00060 
00061    CTHREAD_free(thread->cthread);
00062    free(thread);
00063    return 0;
00064 }

00066 static void evthread_proc( void *ctx );
00067 static void thread_timer_cb( int fd, short event, void *ctx);
00068 
00069 EVTHREAD *EVTHREAD_init(EVLOOP *loop, EVTHREAD_PROC thread_proc,  void *user_ctx)
00070 {
00071   EVTHREAD *thread;
00072 
00073   thread = (EVTHREAD *) malloc( sizeof( EVTHREAD ) );
00074   if (!thread) {
00075     return 0;
00076   }
00077   thread->loop = loop;
00078   thread->thread_proc = thread_proc;
00079   thread->user_context = user_ctx;
00080 
00081   thread->cthread = CTHREAD_init( loop->stacks, evthread_proc, thread );
00082   if (!thread->cthread) {
00083     free(thread);
00084     return 0;
00085   }
00086   thread->socket = 0;
00087 
00088   DLIST_init( &thread->object_list );
00089 
00090   return thread;
00091 }

00093 int EVTHREAD_start( EVTHREAD *thread, struct tagEVSOCKET *socket )
00094 {
00095   thread->socket = socket;
00096   CTHREAD_start( thread->cthread );
00097   return 0;
00098 }

00100 int EVTHREAD_delay( EVTHREAD *thread, struct timeval delay )
00101 {
00102   event_set( &thread->timer_event, -1, 0, thread_timer_cb, (void *) thread );
00103   event_base_set( thread->loop->ev_base, &thread->timer_event );
00104   event_add( &thread->timer_event, &delay );
00105    
00106   CTHREAD_yield( thread );
00107    
00108   event_del( &thread->timer_event );
00109 
00110  
00111   return 0;
00112 }
00113 
00114 static void evthread_proc( void *ctx )
00115 {
00116   EVTHREAD *thread = (EVTHREAD *) ctx;
00117   thread->thread_proc( thread, thread->socket, thread->user_context );
00118 
00119   // no way to get exit status of the EVTHREAD object. everything is hereby closed.
00120   EVTHREAD_free(thread);
00121 }

00123 static void thread_timer_cb( int fd, short event, void *ctx)
00124 {
00125   EVTHREAD *thread = (EVTHREAD *) ctx;
00126  
00127   M_UNUSED(fd);
00128   M_UNUSED(event);
00129 
00130   CTHREAD_resume( thread->cthread );
00131 }

00134 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 void EVTHREAD_OBJECT_init(EVTHREAD_OBJECT *obj, int type, EVTHREAD *owner)
00136 {
00137   DLIST_push_back( &owner->object_list, &obj->entry );
00138   obj->object_type = type;
00139   obj->owner = owner;
00140 }
00141 
00142 void EVTHREAD_OBJECT_free(EVTHREAD_OBJECT *obj)
00143 {
00144   DLIST_unlink( &obj->owner->object_list, &obj->entry );
00145   free(obj);
00146 }

00157 EVTIMER *EVTIMER_init_recurrent(EVTHREAD *thread, int timer_id, struct timeval tm, EVTIMER_PROC proc, void *user_data)
00158 {
00159   return ev_mktimer( thread, timer_id, 1, tm, proc, user_data );

00162 static void timer_cb( int fd, short event, void *ctx);
00163 
00164 int EVTIMER_start( EVTIMER *ret)
00165 {
00166   struct timeval now;
00167 
00168   if (ret->state != EVTIMER_STATE_INIT) {
00169     return -1;
00170   }
00171 
00172   ret->state = EVTIMER_STATE_SCHEDULED;
00173   event_set( &ret->timer_event, -1, 0, timer_cb, (void *) ret );
00174   event_base_set( ret->loop->ev_base, &ret->timer_event );
00175   event_add( &ret->timer_event, &ret->tm );
00176 
00177   if (ret->is_recurrent) {
00178     gettimeofday( &now, 0 );
00179     timeradd( &now, &ret->tm, &ret->next_due_date );
00180   }
00181   return 0;
00182 }
00183 
00184 int  EVTIMER_cancel( EVTIMER *timer )
00185 {
00186   if (timer->state == EVTIMER_STATE_INIT) {
00187     return -1;
00188   }
00189   event_del( &timer->timer_event );
00190    
00191   timer->state = EVTIMER_STATE_INIT;
00192   return 0;
00193 }
00194 
00195 int  EVTIMER_free( EVTIMER *timer )
00196 {
00197   EVTIMER_cancel(timer);
00198   EVTHREAD_OBJECT_free( &timer->object_base );
00199   return 0;
00200 }

00202 EVTIMER *ev_mktimer( EVTHREAD *thread, int timer_id, int is_recurrent, struct timeval tm, EVTIMER_PROC proc, void *user_data)
00203 {
00204   EVTIMER *ret;
00205  
00206   ret = (EVTIMER *) malloc( sizeof( EVTIMER ) );
00207   if (!ret) {
00208     return 0;
00209   }
00210 
00211   ret->loop = thread->loop;
00212   ret->is_recurrent = is_recurrent;
00213   ret->proc = proc;
00214   ret->user_data = user_data;
00215   ret->timer_id = timer_id;
00216   ret->tm = tm;
00217   ret->state = EVTIMER_STATE_INIT;
00218  
00219   EVTHREAD_OBJECT_init( &ret->object_base, EVTHREAD_OBJECT_TIMER , thread );
00220  
00221 //EVTIMER_start( ret ); 
00222   return ret;
00223 }

00225 static void  timer_thread_proc(void *arg)
00226 {
00227   EVTIMER *timer;
00228 
00229   timer = (EVTIMER *) arg;
00230   timer->proc( timer, timer->user_data );
00231 }

00233 
00234 static void timer_cb( int fd, short event, void *ctx)
00235 {
00236    struct timeval now;
00237    EVTIMER *timer;
00238    CTHREAD *thread;
00239 
00240    M_UNUSED(fd);
00241    M_UNUSED(event);
00242 
00243    timer = (EVTIMER *) ctx;
00244 
00245  
00246    event_del( &timer->timer_event );
00247    
00248    thread = CTHREAD_init( timer->loop->stacks , timer_thread_proc , timer );
00249    if (thread) {
00250      CTHREAD_start( thread );
00251      CTHREAD_free( thread );
00252    }
00253    
00254    if (timer->state == EVTIMER_STATE_INIT) {
00255      return;
00256    }
00257 
00258    if (timer->is_recurrent) {
00259      
00260      gettimeofday( &now, 0 );
00261      while( timercmp( &now, &timer->next_due_date, >  ) ) {
00262        timeradd( &timer->next_due_date, &timer->tm, &timer->next_due_date );
00263      }
00264      timersub( &timer->next_due_date, &now, &timer->tm ); 
00265      event_add( &timer->timer_event, &timer->tm );
00266 
00267      timer->state = EVTIMER_STATE_SCHEDULED;
00268    } else {
00269      timer->state = EVTIMER_STATE_INIT;
00270    }
00271 }

00274 static void socket_cb( int fd, short event, void *ctx);
00275 
00276 EVSOCKET *EVSOCKET_init(EVTHREAD *thread, int fd, int is_connected)
00277 {
00278   EVSOCKET *socket;
00279 
00280   socket = (EVSOCKET *) malloc( sizeof( EVSOCKET ) );
00281   if (!socket) {
00282     return 0;
00283   }
00284 
00285 
00286   socket->fd = fd;
00287   socket->timer_idle_timeout = 0;
00288   socket->timer_io_timeout = 0;
00289   socket->state = is_connected ? EVSOCKET_STATE_CONNECTED : EVSOCKET_STATE_INIT; 
00290   
00291   socket->thread = thread;
00292   socket->loop = thread->loop;
00293   
00294   if (fd_set_blocking( fd, 0 )) {
00295     free(socket);
00296     return  0;
00297   }
00298   
00299   EVTHREAD_OBJECT_init( &socket->object_base, EVTHREAD_OBJECT_SOCKET , thread );
00300  
00301   event_set( &socket->read_event, fd, EV_READ , socket_cb, (void *) socket );
00302   event_base_set( socket->loop->ev_base, &socket->read_event );
00303 
00304   event_set( &socket->write_event, fd, EV_WRITE , socket_cb, (void *) socket );
00305   event_base_set( socket->loop->ev_base, &socket->write_event );
00306 
00307   return socket;
00308 }   
00309 
00310 
00311 int EVSOCKET_close(EVSOCKET *socket)
00312 {
00313   int rt;
00314 
00315   if (socket->timer_idle_timeout) {
00316     EVTIMER_free( socket->timer_idle_timeout );
00317   }
00318   if (socket->timer_io_timeout) {
00319     EVTIMER_free( socket->timer_io_timeout);  
00320   }
00321 
00322   event_del( &socket->read_event );   
00323   event_del( &socket->write_event );   
00324   
00325   do {
00326     rt = close(socket->fd);
00327   } while(rt == -1 && errno == EINTR);
00328   
00329 
00330   EVTHREAD_OBJECT_free( &socket->object_base );
00331   return rt;
00332 }
00333 
00334 static void socket_cb( int fd, short event, void *ctx)
00335 {
00336    EVSOCKET *socket; 
00337 
00338    M_UNUSED( fd );
00339    
00340    socket = (EVSOCKET *) ctx;
00341 
00342    if (event & EV_READ && event & EV_WRITE) {
00343      socket->state = EVSOCKET_STATE_ERROR;
00344      CTHREAD_resume( socket->thread->cthread );
00345      return;
00346    }
00347 
00348    if (event & EV_READ) {
00349      if (socket->state == EVSOCKET_STATE_READING) {
00350         CTHREAD_resume( socket->thread->cthread );
00351      }
00352    }
00353   
00354    if (event & EV_WRITE) {
00355      if (socket->state == EVSOCKET_STATE_CONNECTING || socket->state == EVSOCKET_STATE_WRITING) {
00356         CTHREAD_resume( socket->thread->cthread );
00357      }
00358    }
00359     
00360 }
00361 
00362 // called when either connect/read/write has timed out.
00363 
00364 void io_timeout_proc(EVTIMER *timer, void *user_data)
00365 {
00366   EVSOCKET *socket;
00367  
00368   M_UNUSED(timer);
00369 
00370   socket = (EVSOCKET *) user_data;
00371 
00372   socket->state = EVSOCKET_STATE_ERROR;
00373   
00374   close( socket->fd );
00375   socket->fd = -1;
00376 }
00377 
00378 int EVSOCKET_connect( EVSOCKET *socket, struct sockaddr *address, socklen_t socklen, struct timeval timeout)
00379 {
00380   int rt;
00381 
00382   if (socket->state != EVSOCKET_STATE_INIT) {
00383     return -1;
00384   }
00385 
00386   do {
00387     rt = connect( socket->fd, address, socklen );
00388   } while (rt == -1 && errno == EINTR);
00389  
00390   if (rt == 0) {
00391      socket->state = EVSOCKET_STATE_CONNECTED;
00392      return 0;
00393   }
00394   if (rt == -1 && errno == EINPROGRESS) {
00395  
00396      socket->state = EVSOCKET_STATE_CONNECTING;
00397 
00398      socket->timer_io_timeout = EVTIMER_init_one_shot( socket->thread, 1, timeout, io_timeout_proc, socket);
00399 
00400      event_add( &socket->write_event, 0 );
00401      
00402      CTHREAD_yield();
00403 
00404      if (socket->timer_io_timeout) {
00405        EVTIMER_free( socket->timer_io_timeout ); 
00406        socket->timer_io_timeout = 0; 
00407      }
00408 
00409      if (socket->state == EVSOCKET_STATE_CONNECTED) {
00410        return 0;
00411      }
00412   } 
00413   return -1;
00414 }
00415 void EVSOCKET_set_idle_timeout(EVSOCKET *socket, struct timeval timeout )
00416 { 
00417   if (socket->timer_io_timeout != 0) {  
00418     EVTIMER_free( socket->timer_io_timeout ); 
00419   }
00420   socket->timer_io_timeout = EVTIMER_init_one_shot( socket->thread, 1, timeout, io_timeout_proc, socket);
00421 }
00422 
00423 int EVSOCKET_recv( EVSOCKET *socket, void *buf, size_t buf_size, int flags, struct timeval timeout )
00424 {
00425    int rt;
00426    int has_event = 0;
00427 
00428    if ( socket->state != EVSOCKET_STATE_CONNECTED) {
00429      return -1;
00430    }
00431    
00432 r_again:   
00433    do {
00434      rt = recv( socket->fd, buf, buf_size, flags);
00435    } while(rt == -1 && errno == EINTR);
00436 
00437    if (rt == -1) {
00438      if (errno == EAGAIN) {
00439 
00440        socket->state = EVSOCKET_STATE_READING;
00441        socket->timer_io_timeout = EVTIMER_init_one_shot( socket->thread, 1, timeout, io_timeout_proc, socket);
00442 
00443        if (!has_event) {
00444          event_add( &socket->read_event, 0 );
00445          has_event = 1;
00446        }
00447 
00448        CTHREAD_yield();
00449        
00450        if (socket->state != EVSOCKET_STATE_ERROR) {
00451           goto r_again;
00452        }
00453      }
00454    }
00455 
00456    if (has_event) {
00457      event_del( &socket->read_event );
00458    }
00459    
00460    if (rt != -1) {
00461      socket->state = EVSOCKET_STATE_CONNECTED;
00462    } else {
00463      socket->state = EVSOCKET_STATE_ERROR;
00464    }
00465 
00466    if (socket->timer_io_timeout) {
00467      EVTIMER_free( socket->timer_io_timeout ); 
00468      socket->timer_io_timeout = 0; 
00469    }
00470    return rt;
00471 } 
00472 
00473 int EVSOCKET_send_internal( EVSOCKET *socket, void *buf, size_t buf_size, int flags, struct timeval timeout )
00474 {
00475    int rt;
00476    int has_event = 0;
00477 
00478    if ( socket->state != EVSOCKET_STATE_CONNECTED) {
00479      return -1;
00480    }
00481    
00482 w_again:   
00483    do {
00484     rt = send( socket->fd, buf, buf_size, flags);
00485    } while(rt == -1 && errno == EINTR);
00486 
00487    if (rt == -1) {
00488      if (errno == EAGAIN) {
00489 
00490        socket->state = EVSOCKET_STATE_WRITING;
00491        socket->timer_io_timeout = EVTIMER_init_one_shot( socket->thread, 1, timeout, io_timeout_proc, socket);
00492 
00493        if (!has_event) {
00494          event_add( &socket->write_event, 0 );
00495          has_event = 1;
00496        }
00497 
00498        CTHREAD_yield();
00499        
00500        if (socket->state != EVSOCKET_STATE_ERROR) {
00501           goto w_again;
00502        }
00503      }
00504    }
00505   
00506    if (has_event) {
00507      event_del( &socket->write_event );
00508    }  
00509 
00510    if (rt != -1) {
00511      socket->state = EVSOCKET_STATE_CONNECTED;
00512    } else {
00513      socket->state = EVSOCKET_STATE_ERROR;
00514    }
00515 
00516    if (socket->timer_io_timeout) {
00517      EVTIMER_free( socket->timer_io_timeout ); 
00518      socket->timer_io_timeout = 0; 
00519    }
00520 
00521    return rt;
00522 } 
00523 
00524 int EVSOCKET_recv_all( EVSOCKET *socket, void *buf, size_t buf_size, int flags, struct timeval timeout )
00525 {
00526   uint8_t *cur = (uint8_t *) buf;
00527   int pos, rt;
00528 
00529   for(pos = 0 ; buf_size != 0 ; pos += rt ) {
00530     rt = EVSOCKET_recv( socket, cur, buf_size, flags, timeout );
00531     if (rt <= 0) {
00532       return rt;
00533     }
00534     cur += rt;
00535     buf_size -= rt;
00536   } 
00537   return pos;
00538 }
00539 
00540 int EVSOCKET_send( EVSOCKET *socket, void *buf, size_t buf_size, int flags, struct timeval timeout )
00541 {
00542   uint8_t *cur = (uint8_t *) buf;
00543   int pos, rt;
00544 
00545   for(pos = 0 ; buf_size != 0 ; pos += rt ) {
00546 
00547     rt = EVSOCKET_send_internal( socket, cur, buf_size, flags, timeout );
00548     if (rt < 0) {
00549       return -1;
00550     }
00551     cur += rt;
00552     buf_size -= rt;
00553   } 
00554   return pos;
00555 }

00559 static void socket_listener_cb( int fd, short event, void *ctx);
00560 
00561 EVTCPACCEPTOR * EVTCPACCEPTOR_init( EVLOOP *loop, int fd, EVTHREAD_FACTORY factory )
00562 {
00563   EVTCPACCEPTOR *acceptor;
00564 
00565   acceptor = (EVTCPACCEPTOR *) malloc( sizeof( EVTCPACCEPTOR ) );
00566   if (!acceptor) {
00567     return 0;
00568   }
00569   
00570   if (fd_set_blocking( fd, 0 )) {
00571     free(acceptor);
00572     return  0;
00573   }
00574 
00575   acceptor->loop = loop;
00576   acceptor->factory = factory;
00577   acceptor->fd = fd;
00578 
00579   event_set( &acceptor->read_event, fd, EV_READ | EV_PERSIST, socket_listener_cb, (void *) acceptor );
00580   event_base_set( loop->ev_base, &acceptor->read_event );
00581   event_add( &acceptor->read_event, 0 );
00582 
00583   return acceptor;
00584 }
00585 
00586 static void socket_listener_cb( int fd, short event, void *ctx)
00587 {
00588    EVTCPACCEPTOR *acceptor;
00589    EVTHREAD_PROC thread_proc;
00590    void *thread_ctx;
00591    EVTHREAD *thread; 
00592    EVSOCKET *socket;
00593    int sock;
00594 
00595    M_UNUSED(fd);
00596 
00597    if (event & EV_READ && event & EV_WRITE) {
00598       return;
00599    }
00600 
00601    acceptor = (EVTCPACCEPTOR *) ctx;
00602  
00603    do {
00604      sock = accept( acceptor->fd, 0, 0 );
00605    } while( sock == -1 && errno == EINTR);
00606 
00607    if (sock == -1) {
00608      return;
00609    }
00610   
00611    // get thread procedure and thread argument data.
00612    acceptor = (EVTCPACCEPTOR *) ctx;
00613    if ( acceptor->factory( sock, &thread_proc, &thread_ctx ) ) {
00614      close(sock);
00615      return;
00616    }
00617 
00618 
00619    // create the user thread.
00620    thread =EVTHREAD_init( acceptor->loop, thread_proc, thread_ctx);
00621    if (!thread) {
00622      close(sock);
00623      return;
00624    }
00625 
00626    socket = EVSOCKET_init(thread, sock, 1);
00627    if (!socket) {
00628      //close thread)
00629      close(sock);
00630      return;
00631    }
00632 
00633    EVTHREAD_start( thread, socket );
00634 
00635 }

00639    M_UNUSED(base);
00640    M_UNUSED(tv);
